input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Z-Lite 550PHBR-533PM-ORBZ Outdoor Pier Mount Light, Matte Opal Shade Steel

Product specifications:
The geometric lines of the Abbey family combine well with contemporary home styling as well as homes in the craftsmen style
This large wall mount fixture is made of steel and finished in black with matte opal glass
It is made of highly durable material

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This outdoor pier mount light is made of steel and finished in black with matte opal glass. The geometric lines of the Abbey family combine well with contemporary home styling as well as homes in the craftsmen style. It is made of highly durable material.
input_text.Response B: Looking for a lamp for your Sony VPL-FE40, VPL-FX40, VPL-FX41, VPL-FE40L, VPL-FW41L, or VPL-FX40L projector? This Aurabeam Economy Series lamp with housing is the answer. This bulb is designed for a brighter and sharper picture and comes with a 180-day warranty from the manufacturer. This is an exclusive bulb that is only sold by Aurabeam and is the only authorized reseller of their products.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: A good but not great product description. Doesn't mention name of product.
